extensionName.message: Context menu and browsing data API demo

contextMenuItemLastHour.description: Title of context menu item that removes history from last hour when clicked.

contextMenuItemLastDay.description: Title of context menu item that removes history from last day when clicked.

contextMenuItemLastWeek.description: Title of context menu item that removes history from last week when clicked.

contextMenuItemForever.description: Title of context menu item that removes history since earth came into existence when clicked.

contextMenuItemCheckDownloads.description: Title of context menu item when the clear downloads item is checked.

contextMenuItemUncheckDownloads.description: Title of context menu item when the clear downloads item is unchecked.
